name: classic baby blanket
notes:
classic crochet baby blanket – free pattern & video tutorial

this classic crochet baby blanket features a timeless, vintage-inspired design with a modern feel. soft, snuggly, and beautifully textured, it’s the perfect handmade gift for a baby boy, baby girl, or gender-neutral baby shower.

the blanket is made using a simple one-stitch repeat with only single and double crochet stitches. it’s finished with a delicate shell border for a soft, elegant edge and a beautiful reversible design.

pattern features:
• easy crochet baby blanket pattern
• one-stitch repeat using only single and double crochet
• includes photos and a full video tutorial
• fully customizable size for any blanket dimensions
• shell stitch border for a soft, classic finish
• uses any size 4 (medium / worsted weight) yarn
• reversible design that looks beautiful on both sides
• makes a thoughtful handmade baby gift

you can view the free pattern, including step-by-step instructions and a complete video tutorial, on my website here:
→ https://jototheworld.com/classic-baby-blanket-crochet-pattern
